question: A Museum themed on dacoits is to come up in which state?
explanation:
A Museum themed on dacoits is set to come up at the Bhind Police Headquarters, which is located in Madhya Pradesh.
The museum will have unique items used by dacoits like Phoolan Devi, Nirbhay Gujjar. Bhind of Madhya Pradesh lies in the Chambal belt and is said to be Indiaâ€™s most notorious region.
